1050.last_action: Unfavorable Report by Economic Matters; Withdrawn
1050.title: Labor and Employment - Equal Pay for Equal Work
1050.description: Altering a specified provision of law concerning equal pay for equal work to prohibit discrimination on the basis of gender identity; prohibiting an employer from discriminating between employees in any occupation by providing less favorable employment opportunities based on sex or gender identity; prohibiting an employer from taking specified actions concerning the disclosure or discussion of an employee's wages; etc.
